A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After my first viewing I was severely disappointed\, but after seeing it a second time today it's really grown on me. This film is surprisingly deep but you need to pay attention to find the hidden meanings. Initially I would have given it a 2.5\, but after enjoying much much more the second time I would give this movie 4 stars. Would've earned 5 but Finn's storyline was awful and didn't add anything to the plot\, kinda felt like they forgot about him when they wrote the film so they just tacked it on afterwards.
